title: Average costs for a wedding in the United States in 2017 , by item
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Costs in U.S. dollars for 20 number of Categorys.
The maximum Costs in U.S. dollars 33391.0 is found at Category Overall Wedding (with ring and the minimum is found at Catering (price per person) where Category is 70.0.
There is a difference of 33321.0 between the maximum Category Overall Wedding (with ring and minimum Category Catering (price per person).
min_summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Category, and Costs in U.S. dollars in each Category on the y axis.
The maximum Costs in U.S. dollars 33391.0 is found at Category Overall Wedding (with ring and the minimum is found at Catering (price per person) where Category is 70.0.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Costs in U.S. dollars for 20 number of Categorys.
Category Overall Wedding (with ring has the highest Costs in U.S. dollars and Catering (price per person) has the lowest Costs in U.S. dollars.
Category Venue (reception hall) has the second highest value for Costs in U.S. dollars.
There is a difference of 33321.0 between the maximum Category Overall Wedding (with ring and minimum Category Catering (price per person).

The Category Overall Wedding (with ring has the highest Costs in U.S. dollars, followed by Venue (reception hall), and Engagement ring. Down to the Category Catering (price per person) which is the lowest.
The Category Catering (price per person) has 8.67 times less Costs in U.S. dollars than average.
